SELECT CR.REQUEST_ID ,CR.ORG_NAME ,CR.DEPT_NAME ,CR.POSITION_TITLE ,CR.WORK_PURPOSE ,DATE_FORMAT(CR.WORK_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS WORK_START_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(CR.WORK_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS WORK_END_DATE ,CR.APPROVAL_STATUS ,CR.REG_DT FROM TB_CABLE_REQUEST CR WHERE CR.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CR.ORG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orgName}, '%')
AND CR.APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus}
ORDER BY CR.REQUEST_ID DESC

SELECT REQUEST_ID ,ORG_NAME ,DEPT_NAME ,POSITION_TITLE ,WORK_PURPOSE ,WORK_DATE_TYPE ,WORK_START_DATE ,WORK_END_DATE ,APPROVAL_STATUS ,APPROVER_ID ,APPROVAL_DT ,APPROVAL_REMARKS ,DEL_YN ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,UPD_ID ,UPD_DT FROM TB_CABLE_REQUEST WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT WORKER_ID ,COMPANY_NAME ,JOB_TITLE ,WORKER_NAME ,CONTACT FROM TB_WORKER WHERE 1=1
AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{companyName}, '%')
AND WORKER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{workerName}, '%')
ORDER BY WORKER_ID DESC
